summary: A preset file for Adam Lambert
descriptionHtml:
[youtube]MvrWzc5aFJU[/youtube]

Mods needed:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu[/url] (and it's requirements)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50307/?]True Brows[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdos - Renewal
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSkyHair
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56056/?]Mikan Eyes[/url]

Use: 

Open Racemenu (showracemenu in console), select Nord race. Press the preset tab in Racemenu and load preset "Ixum_Adam"

Bodymod used in pics: [url=http://www.ladymoiraine.com/index.php?/files/]SAM[/url] with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59944/?]Ixum's Texture replacer
[/url]Skeleton used [url=http://www.loverslab.com/topic/25971-xp32-maximum-skeleton-extended/]XPSME[/url] 

Installation:
Can be installed with NMM/MO, or manually
author: Ixum
